statement.name: findAlbums
statement.sql: SELECT a.name AS albumname, a.track_count AS track_count, a.artist_count AS artist_count, a.artist AS artist, a.image_hash AS image_hash FROM album a WHERE ((:artist IS NOT NULL AND a.name IN (SELECT DISTINCT(album) FROM track WHERE lower_artist = LOWER(:artist))) OR (:genre IS NOT NULL AND a.name IN (SELECT DISTINCT(album) FROM track WHERE lower_genre = LOWER(:genre)))) AND (:filter IS NULL OR LOWER(a.name) LIKE :filter) GROUP BY albumname, track_count, artist_count, artist, image_hash ORDER BY albumname

statement.name: findAlbumsRestricted
statement.sql: SELECT a.name AS albumname, a.track_count AS track_count, a.artist_count AS artist_count, a.artist AS artist, a.image_hash AS image_hash FROM album a, link_track_playlist rltp, track t WHERE ((:artist IS NOT NULL AND a.name IN (SELECT DISTINCT(album) FROM track WHERE lower_artist = LOWER(:artist))) OR (:genre IS NOT NULL AND a.name IN (SELECT DISTINCT(album) FROM track WHERE lower_genre = LOWER(:genre)))) AND (:filter IS NULL OR LOWER(a.name) LIKE :filter) AND rltp.playlist_id = :restrictedPlaylistId AND rltp.track_id = t.id AND t.album = a.name GROUP BY albumname, track_count, artist_count, artist, image_hash ORDER BY albumname

statement.name: findRandomTracks
statement.sql: SELECT LIMIT 0 :maxCount {trackColumns} FROM track t WHERE (:sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId)) AND (:mediatype IS NULL OR t.mediatype = :mediatype) AND (NOT t.protected OR t.protected = :protected) ORDER BY RAND()

statement.name: findLastUpdatedTracks
statement.sql: SELECT LIMIT 0 :maxCount {trackColumns} FROM track t WHERE :sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId) ORDER BY ts_updated DESC

statement.name: findMostPlayedTracks
statement.sql: SELECT LIMIT 0 :maxCount {trackColumns} FROM track t WHERE :sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId) ORDER BY playcount DESC

statement.name: findRandomTracksRestricted
statement.sql: SELECT LIMIT 0 :maxCount {trackColumns} FROM link_track_playlist rltp, track t WHERE (:sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId)) AND rltp.playlist_id = :restrictedPlaylistId AND t.id = rltp.track_id AND (:mediatype IS NULL OR t.mediatype = :mediatype) AND (NOT t.protected OR t.protected = :protected) ORDER BY RAND()

statement.name: findLastUpdatedTracksRestricted
statement.sql: SELECT LIMIT 0 :maxCount {trackColumns} FROM link_track_playlist rltp, track t WHERE :sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId) AND rltp.playlist_id = :restrictedPlaylistId AND t.id = rltp.track_id ORDER BY ts_updated DESC

statement.name: findMostPlayedTracksRestricted
statement.sql: SELECT LIMIT 0 :maxCount {trackColumns} FROM link_track_playlist rltp, track t WHERE :sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId) AND rltp.playlist_id = :restrictedPlaylistId AND t.id = rltp.track_id ORDER BY playcount DESC

statement.name: findAlbumImage
statement.sql: SELECT LIMIT 0 1 data AS data FROM image i, track t WHERE t.album = :album AND i.hash = t.image_hash AND i.size = :size

statement.name: nextPlaylistId
statement.sql: SELECT TOP 1 NEXT VALUE FOR playlist_id_sequence AS id FROM system_information

statement.name: nextSearchId
statement.sql: SELECT TOP 1 NEXT VALUE FOR search_id_sequence AS id FROM system_information

statement.name: createSearchTempTables
